summary: This bill, the Clean Ocean And Safe Tourism Anti-Drilling Act of 2025, aims to permanently prohibit offshore oil and gas drilling in specific planning areas of the Outer Continental Shelf. These areas include the North Atlantic, Mid-Atlantic, South Atlantic, and Straits of Florida. The bill amends the Outer Continental Shelf Lands Act to prevent the Secretary from issuing leases or authorizations for exploration, development, or production in these designated regions.
